items.sentence: I never imagined I would live in such a nice place.

Can you tell me when Tom got his driver\'s license?
Tom and Mary don\'t like the same kind of TV shows.
You don\'t believe Tom did that on purpose, do you?
Tom is trying to figure out how much money he owes.
Perhaps I could have Tom take care of that for you.
She always writes down every word her teacher says.
I came close to throwing away all these old photos.
I can assure you everything has been taken care of.
Tom made me swear that I\'d never to do that again.
I want a complete list of everything Tom purchased.
You shouldn\'t have put yourself in that situation.
We used to have airplanes, but we had to sell them.
We waited all afternoon for Tom, but he never came.
I want to apologize for the way I acted last night.

There was absolutely nothing you could do about it.
There were only a few days left before the wedding.
